languages.text: {n}Сегодня загадочность Хейнрикса выглядит чуть... загадочнее, чем обычно. Будто он что-то скрывает. Что-то важное.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Сегодня загадочность Хейнрикса выглядит чуть... загадочнее, чем обычно. Будто он что-то скрывает. Что-то важное.{/n}

languages.text: {n}For an inscrutable man, Heinrix is being even more inscrutable than usual. It's as if he is hiding something. Something important.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сегодня загадочность Хейнрикса выглядит чуть... загадочнее, чем обычно. Будто он что-то скрывает. Что-то важное.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's mysteriousness today is a little more... mysterious than usual. It's as if he is hiding something. Something important.{/n}
{n}Heinrix's mysteriousness today is a little more... mysterious than usual. It's as if he is hiding something. Something important.{/n}
{n}For an inscrutable man, Heinrix is being even more inscrutable than usual. It's as if he is hiding something. Something important.{/n}
{n}For an inscrutable man, Heinrix is being even more inscrutable than usual. It's as if he is hiding something. Something important.{/n}
{n}For an inscrutable man, Heinrix is being even more inscrutable than usual. It's as if he is hiding something. Something important.{/n}

languages.text: {n}何を考えているのかよく分からない男であるハインリックスが、普段以上によく分からない。まるで何かを隠しているようだ。重要な何かを。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For an inscrutable man, Heinrix is being even more inscrutable than usual. It's as if he is hiding something. Something important.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}何を考えているのかよく分からない男であるハインリックスが、普段以上によく分からない。まるで何かを隠しているようだ。重要な何かを。{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管海因里希平时就少言寡语，但他此刻的表情比平时更加高深莫测。他似乎在隐藏什么事情，某件很重要的事情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For an inscrutable man, Heinrix is being even more inscrutable than usual. It's as if he is hiding something. Something important.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管海因里希平时就少言寡语，但他此刻的表情比平时更加高深莫测。他似乎在隐藏什么事情，某件很重要的事情。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix tiene fama de inexpresivo, pero ahora lo está siendo más que de costumbre. Da la impresión de que oculta algo. Algo importante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For an inscrutable man, Heinrix is being even more inscrutable than usual. It's as if he is hiding something. Something important.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix tiene fama de inexpresivo, pero ahora lo está siendo más que de costumbre. Da la impresión de que oculta algo. Algo importante.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pour un homme impénétrable, Heinrix est encore plus insondable que d'habitude, comme s'il cachait quelque chose. Quelque chose d'important.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For an inscrutable man, Heinrix is being even more inscrutable than usual. It's as if he is hiding something. Something important.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pour un homme impénétrable, Heinrix est encore plus insondable que d'habitude, comme s'il cachait quelque chose. Quelque chose d'important.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix ist noch unergründlicher als sonst. Als würde er etwas verbergen. Etwas Wichtiges.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For an inscrutable man, Heinrix is being even more inscrutable than usual. It's as if he is hiding something. Something important.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix ist noch unergründlicher als sonst. Als würde er etwas verbergen. Etwas Wichtiges.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, doğası gereği esrarlı olsa da şimdi her zamankinden de anlaşılmaz davranıyor. Sanki bir şey saklıyor, hem de önemli bir şey.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For an inscrutable man, Heinrix is being even more inscrutable than usual. It's as if he is hiding something. Something important.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix doğası gereği esrarlı olsa da, şimdi her zamankinden de çok anlaşılmaz bir hâlde. Sanki bir şey saklıyormuş gibi. Hem de önemli bir şey.{/n}
